name: CSS
description: Hands-on CSS coding problem statements to master styling, layouts, responsiveness, and modern UI techniques.

topics.name: CSS Basics
questions: Apply colors to text using named colors, HEX, RGB, and HSL.
Style headings and paragraphs using font-family, font-size, and font-weight.
Create a webpage demonstrating margin, padding, and border differences.
Style a button with background color, border-radius, and hover effect.
Apply text alignment and text decoration styles to content.

topics.name: Selectors
questions: Style elements using class selectors.
Style elements using id selectors.
Use descendant and child selectors to style nested elements.
Apply styles using attribute selectors.
Demonstrate pseudo-classes like :hover, :focus, and :active.

topics.name: Box Model
questions: Create two boxes showing the difference between content-box and border-box.
Design a card layout using margin, padding, and border.
Demonstrate overflow hidden, scroll, and auto.
Create a layout showing collapsed margins.
Style an element with box-shadow and outline.

topics.name: Display & Position
questions: Demonstrate block, inline, and inline-block elements.
Hide and show elements using display and visibility.
Position an element using relative and absolute positioning.
Create a fixed header that stays on top while scrolling.
Build a sticky navigation bar.

topics.name: Flexbox
questions: Create a horizontal navigation bar using Flexbox.
Center a div both horizontally and vertically using Flexbox.
Build a responsive card layout using flex-wrap.
Reorder elements using the order property.
Create equal-height columns using Flexbox.

topics.name: CSS Grid
questions: Create a basic grid layout with rows and columns.
Build a page layout using CSS Grid (header, sidebar, content, footer).
Create a photo gallery using grid-gap.
Span rows and columns using grid-row and grid-column.
Make a responsive grid using auto-fit and minmax.

topics.name: Responsive Design
questions: Make a webpage responsive using media queries.
Change layout styles for mobile, tablet, and desktop screens.
Hide elements on small screens using media queries.
Create a responsive navigation menu.
Build a mobile-first responsive card layout.

topics.name: Typography
questions: Style text using line-height and letter-spacing.
Create a responsive typography system using rem units.
Apply custom Google Fonts to a webpage.
Demonstrate text overflow using ellipsis.
Create a readable article layout using typography rules.

topics.name: Animations & Transitions
questions: Add a hover transition effect to a button.
Create a loading spinner using CSS animations.
Animate a box moving from left to right using keyframes.
Create a pulsing animation effect.
Build a simple dropdown animation using CSS only.

topics.name: Advanced CSS
questions: Create a dark mode theme using CSS variables.
Build a neumorphism-style card using box-shadow.
Design a glassmorphism UI card using backdrop-filter.
Create a custom checkbox and radio button using CSS.
Implement a CSS-only tooltip.

topics.name: Mini Projects (CSS Focused)
questions: Style a complete landing page using HTML and CSS.
Build a responsive pricing table.
Create a dashboard layout using Grid and Flexbox.
Design a profile card with hover effects.
Build a responsive image gallery with animations.
